    Single history workflow

    single_history.Rmd

    Setting up

    Below is an example of a more complicated workflow, starting from a simple input file, to be used as an example of a full rtrackr workflow.

    We will define and log a simple dataframe for this example. For more information, please see Getting started.

    df <- data.frame(a = c('a', 'b', 'c'), b = c(1, 2, 3))
    Details
    a b
    a 1
    b 2
    c 3 
    trackr_dir <- '~/Documents/Personal/trackr_dev/trackr_dir'

#setup a new trackr
df <- trackr_new(df, trackr_dir = trackr_dir, timepoint_message = 'Start', log_data = T)
    ## [1] "Successfully written trackr file 7834337cead04131c959f42ee53b3f2e5422e178.json"
## [1] "Successfully written trackr data log 7834337cead04131c959f42ee53b3f2e5422e178_dl.json"

    Workflow

    #make some change to the data 
df <- df %>% dplyr::mutate(b = b + 1)

df <- trackr_timepoint(df, trackr_dir = trackr_dir, timepoint_message = 'Change point #1', log_data = T)
    ## [1] "Successfully written trackr file 3e9baf5b6c3bb5bade4ce2cf2ecfe68601c94550.json"
## [1] "Successfully written trackr data log 3e9baf5b6c3bb5bade4ce2cf2ecfe68601c94550_dl.json"
    Details
    a b trackr_id
    a 2 3e9baf5b6c3bb5bade4ce2cf2ecfe68601c94550_9b298ab2c9539c0d7f187ce26315f459fa58e78e
    b 3 3e9baf5b6c3bb5bade4ce2cf2ecfe68601c94550_0d62e87ad3877b0c51934dd0c38cba3467375b09
    c 4 3e9baf5b6c3bb5bade4ce2cf2ecfe68601c94550_b1ba9407cf19da9a3625e46f5378484323799a05 
    #repeat for subsequent processing steps
df <- df %>% dplyr::mutate(b = b + 300)

df <- trackr_timepoint(df, trackr_dir = trackr_dir, timepoint_message = 'Change point #2', log_data = T)
    ## [1] "Successfully written trackr file c10dd7f08636a58d60939bb779db91eb9df353ff.json"
## [1] "Successfully written trackr data log c10dd7f08636a58d60939bb779db91eb9df353ff_dl.json"
    Details
    a b trackr_id
    a 302 c10dd7f08636a58d60939bb779db91eb9df353ff_df6c36b931b3c85b98b33b3be98d70c6c3569d95
    b 303 c10dd7f08636a58d60939bb779db91eb9df353ff_ad3a917f44d6a3f9fbc121c14cf631784c721fc4
    c 304 c10dd7f08636a58d60939bb779db91eb9df353ff_20e8c8352858485ba2abdc2a151f5cc2dbcf4503 
    #splitting a single record into multiples
df <- rbind(df, df %>% dplyr::mutate(b = b -300))

df <- trackr_timepoint(df, trackr_dir = trackr_dir, timepoint_message = 'Dividing rows', log_data = T)
    ## [1] "Successfully written trackr file f0b5059268b2a9e5f36e81df47ee9ae1195daf59.json"
## [1] "Successfully written trackr data log f0b5059268b2a9e5f36e81df47ee9ae1195daf59_dl.json"
    Details
    a b trackr_id
    a 302 f0b5059268b2a9e5f36e81df47ee9ae1195daf59_df6c36b931b3c85b98b33b3be98d70c6c3569d95
    b 303 f0b5059268b2a9e5f36e81df47ee9ae1195daf59_ad3a917f44d6a3f9fbc121c14cf631784c721fc4
    c 304 f0b5059268b2a9e5f36e81df47ee9ae1195daf59_20e8c8352858485ba2abdc2a151f5cc2dbcf4503
    a 2 f0b5059268b2a9e5f36e81df47ee9ae1195daf59_9b298ab2c9539c0d7f187ce26315f459fa58e78e
    b 3 f0b5059268b2a9e5f36e81df47ee9ae1195daf59_0d62e87ad3877b0c51934dd0c38cba3467375b09
    c 4 f0b5059268b2a9e5f36e81df47ee9ae1195daf59_b1ba9407cf19da9a3625e46f5378484323799a05 
    #summarising data
df <- df %>% dplyr::group_by(a)

df <- trackr_summarise(df, n = dplyr::n())
    ## Joining, by = "a"
    df <- trackr_timepoint(df, trackr_dir = trackr_dir, timepoint_message = 'Summarising rows', log_data = T)
    ## [1] "Successfully written trackr file 81df9ebaa813b055a532db97113a53b32d1532f2.json"
## [1] "Successfully written trackr data log 81df9ebaa813b055a532db97113a53b32d1532f2_dl.json"
    Details
    a n trackr_id
    a 2 81df9ebaa813b055a532db97113a53b32d1532f2_9b298ab2c9539c0d7f187ce26315f459fa58e78e
    b 2 81df9ebaa813b055a532db97113a53b32d1532f2_d6543aeb67806714fa9e9567dc5c46b2106ae843
    c 2 81df9ebaa813b055a532db97113a53b32d1532f2_c7a74dd8ad5c5743a5983d3102600cc7f9df9370 
    df <- df %>% dplyr::mutate(n = n**runif(3))

df <- trackr_timepoint(df, trackr_dir = trackr_dir, timepoint_message = 'Further Processing', log_data = T)
    ## [1] "Successfully written trackr file 7f71ddb87d405c68098314c1ef06362d1f991aef.json"
## [1] "Successfully written trackr data log 7f71ddb87d405c68098314c1ef06362d1f991aef_dl.json"
    Details
    a n trackr_id
    a 1.557909 7f71ddb87d405c68098314c1ef06362d1f991aef_0f5c1ed711b013e1925a79a14cd7c2f5c45c861b
    b 1.130378 7f71ddb87d405c68098314c1ef06362d1f991aef_cac4738658ccc058f39a433df6dd2ff992e9c548
    c 1.743051 7f71ddb87d405c68098314c1ef06362d1f991aef_88cf27c03cb220b1d764b577ca03ef5ec0027f3e 
    df <- rbind(df, df %>% dplyr::mutate(n = n -60), df %>% dplyr::mutate(n = n * 2), df %>% dplyr::mutate(n = n * 56))

df <- trackr_timepoint(df, trackr_dir = trackr_dir, timepoint_message = 'Really messing with things', log_data = T)
    ## [1] "Successfully written trackr file c48022b8f70780123e03acbc5f169f0fa127f401.json"
## [1] "Successfully written trackr data log c48022b8f70780123e03acbc5f169f0fa127f401_dl.json"

    a n trackr_id

    b 1.130378 c48022b8f70780123e03acbc5f169f0fa127f401_cac4738658ccc058f39a433df6dd2ff992e9c548

    a 87.242889 c48022b8f70780123e03acbc5f169f0fa127f401_67cf8f99b3aff0a0b6652d9db42f6ffaa296ee97
    b 63.301194 c48022b8f70780123e03acbc5f169f0fa127f401_fde0f12f06e8eee7f553654079554003a074d1e5
    c 97.610854 c48022b8f70780123e03acbc5f169f0fa127f401_8d098ae78f8defae6a896c97883f92a46dc8932a 
    df <- df %>% dplyr::mutate(n = n + 1)

df <- trackr_timepoint(df, trackr_dir = trackr_dir, timepoint_message = 'added 1', log_data = T)
    ## [1] "Successfully written trackr file e490b5f45a766ae646631b4001fba85180ca8d2e.json"

    df <- df %>% dplyr::group_by(a) %>%
  trackr_summarise(n =  dplyr::n())
    ## Joining, by = "a"
    df <- trackr_timepoint(df, trackr_dir = trackr_dir, timepoint_message = 'grouped', log_data = T)
    ## [1] "Successfully written trackr file dc00a5b1833af611da924c399d2ba523f59a425f.json"

    Results

    Inspect the full processing chain of a single record with trackr_lineage() and trackr_network().

    target_id <- df$trackr_id[1]
trackr_lineage(target_id, trackr_dir)
    ## [1] "Successfully written 2ff4bb8a56094a2129ba0c55e08aab1130222a99_2a8b275852b4085d374094c98a3f95bc0e22ec3b_lineage.json"
    lineage_fn <- paste0(trackr_dir, '/', target_id, '_lineage.json')

trackr_network(lineage_fn)

    Clean up

    clean_trackr_dir(trackr_dir)
